decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (10-000, EX-010, EX-003, EX-004, EX-001, EX-002, PL-003, PL-004, PL-002, received 27/08/2013, PL-001 Revision A, PL-005 Revision A, Unnumbered design and access statement, received 22/10/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the ground floor rear and side extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a ground floor rear and side extension and refurbishment of existing loft at the property
